sample = stats.expon.rvs(scale=5, size=100) #scale = 5 means 1 event in 5 minute, which is equal to the rate =0.2 in R code.
#You may understand rate = 0.2 in R code is equal to lambda, scale = 5 is equal to 1/lambda
